verses.verse: In that day <S%H3117><s%> shall this <S%H2088><s%> song <S%H7892><s%> be sung <S%H7891><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Judah; <S%H3063><s%> We have a strong <S%H5797><s%> city; <S%H5892><s%> salvation <S%H3444><s%> will God appoint <S%H7896><s%> for walls <S%H2346><s%> and bulwarks. <S%H2426><s%>
Open <S%H6605><s%> you the gates, <S%H8179><s%> that the righteous <S%H6662><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%> which keeps <S%H8104><s%> the truth <S%H529><s%> may enter <S%H935><s%> in.
You will keep <S%H5341><s%> him in perfect peace, <S%H7965><s%> whose mind <S%H3336><s%> is stayed <S%H5564><s%> on you: because <S%H3588><s%> he trusts <S%H982><s%> in you.
Trust <S%H982><s%> you in the LORD <S%H3068><s%> for ever: <S%H5703><s%> for in the LORD <S%H3050><s%> JEHOVAH <S%H3068><s%> is everlasting <S%H5769><s%> strength: <S%H6697><s%>

For he brings <S%H7817><s%> down <S%H7817><s%> them that dwell <S%H3427><s%> on <S%H4791><s%> high; <S%H4791><s%> the lofty <S%H7682><s%> city, <S%H7151><s%> he lays it low; <S%H8213><s%> he lays it low, <S%H8213><s%> even to the ground; <S%H776><s%> he brings <S%H5060><s%> it even to the dust. <S%H6083><s%>
The foot <S%H7272><s%> shall tread <S%H7429><s%> it down, even the feet <S%H7272><s%> of the poor, <S%H6041><s%> and the steps <S%H6471><s%> of the needy. <S%H1800><s%>
The way <S%H734><s%> of the just <S%H6662><s%> is uprightness: <S%H4339><s%> you, most upright, <S%H3477><s%> do weigh <S%H6424><s%> the path <S%H4570><s%> of the just. <S%H6662><s%>

Yes, <S%H637><s%> in the way <S%H734><s%> of your judgments, <S%H4941><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> have we waited <S%H6960><s%> for you; the desire <S%H8378><s%> of our soul <S%H5315><s%> is to your name, <S%H8034><s%> and to the remembrance <S%H2143><s%> of you.

With my soul <S%H5315><s%> have I desired <S%H183><s%> you in the night; <S%H3915><s%> yes, <S%H637><s%> with my spirit <S%H7307><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> me will I seek <S%H7836><s%> you early: <S%H7836><s%> for when <S%H834><s%> your judgments <S%H4941><s%> are in the earth, <S%H776><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the world <S%H8398><s%> will learn <S%H3925><s%> righteousness. <S%H6664><s%>

Let favor <S%H2603><s%> be showed to the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> yet will he not learn <S%H3925><s%> righteousness: <S%H6664><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of uprightness <S%H5229><s%> will he deal unjustly, <S%H5765><s%> and will not behold <S%H7200><s%> the majesty <S%H1348><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

LORD, <S%H3068><s%> when your hand <S%H3027><s%> is lifted <S%H7311><s%> up, they will not see: <S%H2372><s%> but they shall see, <S%H2372><s%> and be ashamed <S%H954><s%> for their envy <S%H7068><s%> at the people; <S%H5971><s%> yes, <S%H637><s%> the fire <S%H784><s%> of your enemies <S%H6862><s%> shall devour <S%H398><s%> them.
LORD, <S%H3068><s%> you will ordain <S%H8239><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> for us: for you also <S%H1571><s%> have worked <S%H6466><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> our works <S%H4639><s%> in us.

O LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> other lords <S%H113><s%> beside <S%H2108><s%> you have had dominion <S%H1166><s%> over us: but by you only <S%H905><s%> will we make mention <S%H2142><s%> of your name. <S%H8034><s%>

They are dead, <S%H4191><s%> they shall not live; <S%H2421><s%> they are deceased, <S%H7496><s%> they shall not rise: <S%H6965><s%> therefore <S%H3651><s%> have you visited <S%H6485><s%> and destroyed <S%H8045><s%> them, and made all <S%H3605><s%> their memory <S%H2143><s%> to perish. <S%H6><s%>

You have increased <S%H3254><s%> the nation, <S%H1471><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> you have increased <S%H3254><s%> the nation: <S%H1471><s%> you are glorified: <S%H3513><s%> you had removed <S%H7368><s%> it far <S%H7368><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> the ends <S%H7097><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>
LORD, <S%H3068><s%> in trouble <S%H6862><s%> have they visited <S%H6485><s%> you, they poured <S%H6694><s%> out a prayer <S%H3908><s%> when your chastening <S%H4148><s%> was on them.

Like <S%H3644><s%> as a woman with child, <S%H2030><s%> that draws near <S%H7126><s%> the time of her delivery, <S%H3205><s%> is in pain, <S%H2342><s%> and cries <S%H2199><s%> out in her pangs; <S%H2256><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> have we been <S%H1961><s%> in your sight, <S%H6440><s%> O LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

We have been with child, <S%H2029><s%> we have been in pain, <S%H2342><s%> we have as it were brought <S%H3205><s%> forth <S%H3205><s%> wind; <S%H7307><s%> we have not worked <S%H6213><s%> any deliverance <S%H3444><s%> in the earth; <S%H776><s%> neither <S%H1077><s%> have the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the world <S%H8398><s%> fallen. <S%H5307><s%>

Your dead <S%H4191><s%> men shall live, <S%H2421><s%> together with my dead <S%H5038><s%> body <S%H5038><s%> shall they arise. <S%H6965><s%> Awake <S%H6974><s%> and sing, <S%H7442><s%> you that dwell <S%H7931><s%> in dust: <S%H6083><s%> for your dew <S%H2919><s%> is as the dew <S%H2919><s%> of herbs, <S%H219><s%> and the earth <S%H776><s%> shall cast <S%H5307><s%> out the dead. <S%H7496><s%>

Come, <S%H3212><s%> my people, <S%H5971><s%> enter <S%H935><s%> you into your chambers, <S%H2315><s%> and shut <S%H5462><s%> your doors <S%H1817><s%> about <S%H1157><s%> you: hide <S%H2247><s%> yourself as it were for a little <S%H4592><s%> moment, <S%H7281><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the indignation <S%H2195><s%> be over. <S%H5674><s%>

For, behold, <S%H2009><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> comes <S%H3318><s%> out of his place <S%H4725><s%> to punish <S%H6485><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> for their iniquity: <S%H5771><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> also shall disclose <S%H1540><s%> her blood, <S%H1818><s%> and shall no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> cover <S%H3680><s%> her slain. <S%H2026><s%>
